dmca.title: [ABUSE] Re: [SUPPORT] Infringing material on YOUR server.
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2005 4:52 PM
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: [SUPPORT] Infringing material on YOUR server.

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Erich Zigler <ezigler@theplanet.com>
To: Adam <adam2737@bresnan.net>
Date: Wednesday, February 23, 2005, 4:27:37 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Re: [SUPPORT] Infringing material on YOUR server.

===8<==============Original message text===============
I am escalating this to our Abuse department for further information.

Adam wrote:
> To whom it may concern,
>
>     I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the hosted site
> http://zonehacks.net/, pointed to this server is in violation of section
> 73.1206 of FCC rules, 47 C.F.R.
